alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 6:08PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston and east central Brazoria Counties through 630 PM CST... At 607 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Fe, moving northeast at around 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern League City, Texas City, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Hitchcock, Kemah, Bayou Vista, San Leon, Kemah Boardwalk and Bacliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston
